name: Rail Express: Cargo & Passenger Trains Driving
name_original: Rail Express: Cargo & Passenger Trains Driving
description:
Get ready to enjoy the most realistic cargo & passenger train drive. Rail Express is the perfect adventure game for driving heavy trains. Control locomotive railway engine & keep it on track on high speed. You will also have to pick passengers from stations and drop them off to their final destinations. You will also be transporting cars to other cities. Enjoy the exciting gameplay & play as a real train driver for endless driving fun.

You will enjoy realistic controls and dynamic game play and you will be able to drive your own train on a fast train track.

Rail Express Features:
+ Cargo & Passenger Trains Driving Simulator Game
+ Realistic Train Driving Gameplay & Animations
+ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
+ Pick and drop of Passengers from City Subway Stations
+ Real Train Physics and Smooth Controls
+ Amazing Graphics and Tricky Tracks to Drive the Train
